import React, {useState} from 'react' import { Card, Icon, Grid, Label, Feed} from 'semantic-ui-react' import LabelWIm from "./LabelWIm"; import { HiDotsVertical} from "react-icons/hi"; import ClearButton from './ClearButton'; import Comments from './Comments'; import Reveal from "./Reveal"; const FeedCard = (props) => { const [likes, updateLikes] = useState(props.likes); return(
{/* like button */} {likes} Share Save {/* */} {/* */} 4 Friends
); } export default FeedCard;
